title: This Home Is A Must See!!!
posting_body: Groveland Manor welcomes all newcomers and current residents with warmth and respect from our professionally managed and beautifully maintained community.
Our gorgeous country setting provides for a quiet and active lifestyle.
We offer a pool, basketball court, playground, dog walk area, boat/RV storage, and community clubhouse for hosting community events.

This home features a spacious galley style kitchen that comes equipped with all black appliances (refrigerator, stove/oven, microwave/hood vent, dishwasher, garbage disposal, and washer/dryer hookups).
Loads of cabinet space in a spacious kitchen to cook up homemade meals.
Fresh paint, flooring, and COVID sanitized.
Your own private yard to build a snowman, seasonal decorations, and a storage shed!
The safety and security of your own private entrance to your home, no shared walls, and open-air space provides for your family to live a well-balanced socially distant life.
This home has 2 huge bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms.
Here at Yes Communities and Groveland Manor we pride ourselves on offering Gold Key Services (Preventative/Routine/Emergency Services).
